channel.title: Folie - The Website Builder - Scroll Story Slider Template

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[cl_slider fullheight="1" navigation="0" effect="slide" direction="vertical" speed="1000" mousewheel="1" anchor_labels="1" fullheight_responsive="1" responsive_plain_slider="0"][cl_slide animation="cinemagraphs1" add_scroll_svg="1" animation_slide="cinemagraphs_first"][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="rgba(15,15,15,0.44)" background_image="{'uploading':'false','date':'1498844472000','filename':'1.jpg','menuOrder':'0','uploadedTo':'0','type':'image','subtype':'jpeg','url':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2F1.jpg','title':'1','caption':'','alt':'','description':'','id':'150','link':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2F%3Fattachment_id%3D150','author':'1','name':'1','status':'inherit','modified':'1498844472000','mime':'image%2Fjpeg','icon':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-includes%2Fimages%2Fmedia%2Fdefault.png','dateFormatted':'June%2030%2C%202017','nonces':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','editLink':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-admin%2Fpost.php%3Fpost%3D150%26action%3Dedit','meta':'false','authorName':'admin','filesizeInBytes':'168396','filesizeHumanReadable':'164%20KB','height':'1066','width':'1600','orientation':'landscape','sizes':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','compat':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D'}_-_json" animation_speed="1000" background_blend="overlay" background_position="center center" animation_delay="100" anchor_label="Intro" custom_width="1350"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0','padding-bottom':'0','padding-left':'30px','padding-right':'30px'}_-_json"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'35px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_size="36px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="50px"]

It is not more bigness 

that should be our goal.

[/cl_custom_heading][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide animation_slide="cinemagraphs_two"][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'45px','padding-bottom':'45px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="rgba(15,15,15,0.25)" background_image="{'uploading':'false','date':'1498845236000','filename':'2.jpg','menuOrder':'0','uploadedTo':'0','type':'image','subtype':'jpeg','url':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2F2.jpg','title':'2','caption':'','alt':'','description':'','id':'161','link':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2F%3Fattachment_id%3D161','author':'1','name':'2','status':'inherit','modified':'1498845236000','mime':'image%2Fjpeg','icon':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-includes%2Fimages%2Fmedia%2Fdefault.png','dateFormatted':'June%2030%2C%202017','nonces':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','editLink':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-admin%2Fpost.php%3Fpost%3D161%26action%3Dedit','meta':'false','authorName':'admin','filesizeInBytes':'178777','filesizeHumanReadable':'175%20KB','height':'1067','width':'1600','orientation':'landscape','sizes':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','compat':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D'}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="0.35" background_blend="overlay" anchor_label="The Beginning"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0','padding-bottom':'0','padding-left':'30px','padding-right':'30px'}_-_json"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'35px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_size="36px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="50px"]

We are a community. 

Our individual Fates are linked

[/cl_custom_heading][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" background_color="#ffffff" background_image="{'id':'33','title':'pexels-photo-compressed','filename':'pexels-photo-compressed.jpg','url':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2Fpexels-photo-compressed.jpg','link':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2F%3Fattachment_id%3D33','alt':'','author':'1','description':'','caption':'','name':'pexels-photo-compressed','status':'inherit','uploadedTo':'0','date':'Thu%20Jun%2029%202017%2022%3A19%3A44%20GMT%2B0200%20(W.%20Europe%20Daylight%20Time)','modified':'Thu%20Jun%2029%202017%2022%3A19%3A44%20GMT%2B0200%20(W.%20Europe%20Daylight%20Time)','menuOrder':'0','mime':'image%2Fjpeg','type':'image','subtype':'jpeg','icon':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-includes%2Fimages%2Fmedia%2Fdefault.png','dateFormatted':'June%2029%2C%202017','nonces':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','editLink':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-admin%2Fpost.php%3Fpost%3D33%26action%3Dedit','meta':'false','authorName':'admin','filesizeInBytes':'130155','filesizeHumanReadable':'127%20KB','height':'1067','width':'1600','orientation':'landscape','sizes':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','compat':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D'}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="0.35" background_blend="screen" anchor_label="Our Community"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0','padding-bottom':'0','padding-left':'20px','padding-right':'20px'}_-_json" horizontal_align="middle"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'35px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_line_height="38px" custom_responsive_768_size="26px"]

We are a community. 

Our individual Fates are linked

[/cl_custom_heading][cl_text custom_typography="1" text_font_size="18" text_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.36)" css_style="{'margin-top':'35px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="700" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_992_size="11px" custom_responsive_992_line_height="18px" custom_responsive_768_size="14px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="20px" custom_responsive_992_bool="1"]

Properly speaking, global thinking is not possibleâ€¦ Look at one of those photographs of half the earth taken

 from outer space, and see if you recognize your neighborhood.

[/cl_text][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide add_scroll_svg="1"][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="#1d78c6" background_image="{}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="0.35" custom_width_bool="1" anchor_label="History"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0','padding-bottom':'0','padding-left':'20px','padding-right':'20px'}_-_json"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'35px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_992_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_992_size="36px" custom_responsive_992_line_height="50px" custom_responsive_768_size="28px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="36px"]

"We become human only in the company of other human beings. And this involves both opening our hearts and giving voice to our deepest convictions. ..."

[/cl_custom_heading][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide animation_slide="cinemagraphs_two"][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="rgba(10,10,10,0.26)" background_image="{'uploading':'false','date':'1498843644000','filename':'6.jpg','menuOrder':'0','uploadedTo':'0','type':'image','subtype':'jpeg','url':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2F6.jpg','title':'6','caption':'','alt':'','description':'','id':'137','link':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2F%3Fattachment_id%3D137','author':'1','name':'6','status':'inherit','modified':'1498843644000','mime':'image%2Fjpeg','icon':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-includes%2Fimages%2Fmedia%2Fdefault.png','dateFormatted':'June%2030%2C%202017','nonces':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','editLink':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-admin%2Fpost.php%3Fpost%3D137%26action%3Dedit','meta':'false','authorName':'admin','filesizeInBytes':'315137','filesizeHumanReadable':'308%20KB','height':'700','width':'1200','orientation':'landscape','sizes':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','compat':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D'}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="0.35" background_blend="overlay" anchor_label="Philosophy"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px','padding-left':'30px','padding-right':'30px'}_-_json"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'80px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_992_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_992_size="36px" custom_responsive_992_line_height="50px" custom_responsive_768_size="36px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="50px"]

No man is an island, 

entire of itself.     

[/cl_custom_heading][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide add_scroll_svg="1"][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="#0a0a0a" background_image="{}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="1" anchor_label="My Prediction"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px','padding-left':'30px','padding-right':'30px'}_-_json"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'80px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_992_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_line_height="38px" custom_responsive_992_size="36px" custom_responsive_992_line_height="50px" custom_responsive_768_size="26px"]

I know there is strength in the 

differences between us. I know there is 

comfort, where we overlap.

[/cl_custom_heading][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide animation_slide="cinemagraphs_two"][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="rgba(10,10,10,0.29)" background_image="{'uploading':'false','date':'1498843229000','filename':'3.jpg','menuOrder':'0','uploadedTo':'0','type':'image','subtype':'jpeg','url':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2F3.jpg','title':'3','caption':'','alt':'','description':'','id':'124','link':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2F%3Fattachment_id%3D124','author':'1','name':'3','status':'inherit','modified':'1498843229000','mime':'image%2Fjpeg','icon':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-includes%2Fimages%2Fmedia%2Fdefault.png','dateFormatted':'June%2030%2C%202017','nonces':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','editLink':'http%3A%2F%2Fcodeless.co%2Ffolie%2Fscroll-story%2Fwp-admin%2Fpost.php%3Fpost%3D124%26action%3Dedit','meta':'false','authorName':'admin','filesizeInBytes':'159947','filesizeHumanReadable':'156%20KB','height':'1067','width':'1600','orientation':'landscape','sizes':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D','compat':'%5Bobject%20Object%5D'}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="0.35" background_blend="overlay" anchor_label="What's Next"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px','padding-left':'30px','padding-right':'30px'}_-_json"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'80px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_992_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_992_size="36px" custom_responsive_992_line_height="50px" custom_responsive_768_size="36px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="50px"]

Community is a sign 

that love is possible in a 

materialistic world

[/cl_custom_heading][/cl_column][/cl_row][/cl_slide][cl_slide][cl_row row_type="container-fluid" fullheight="1" css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px'}_-_json" text_color="light-text" background_color="#0a0a0a" background_image="{}_-_json" overlay_color="#0a0909" overlay_opacity="1" anchor_label="The End"][cl_column css_style="{'padding-top':'0px','padding-bottom':'0px','padding-left':'30px','padding-right':'30px'}_-_json" horizontal_align="middle"][cl_custom_heading css_style="{'margin-top':'80px'}_-_json" animation="bottom-t-top" animation_delay="500" animation_speed="1000" custom_responsive_992_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_bool="1" custom_responsive_768_size="36px" custom_responsive_768_line_height="50px" custom_responsive_992_line_height="50px"]

Hey, tell your story with Folie!
